messages.message:
Hi team, does anyone know how to fix a `transport: Error while dialing dial unix /var/run/desktop-containerd/containerd.sock` error? I'm trying to run model-training-tasks locally, and so far I've tried running
```cd distributed-tasks/celery/model-training-tasks/service-cpu/
make clean build-docker run-docker```
as well as `ppy compile model-training-tasks --as-docker && ppy start model-training-tasks --as-docker`. Both result in this error:
can you change the docker build command in instabase/shared-utils/build-utils/shared/docker.mk to this `DOCKER_BUILD_CMD := DOCKER_DEFAULT_PLATFORM=linux/amd64 docker build`
yup docker desktop is running, i tried running it from the docker app but it gave the same error :thinking_face:
also same error after changing the build command rip
maybe try restarting docker desktop and/or your laptopâ€¦? not sure what else to try sorry :sweat_smile:
